posts.post_content: This is a great card. In my opinion it's "drawback" is not a drawback at all. Put it on a creature you intend to beat face with and then use it to beat face! If that creature dies or becomes otherwise incapacitated (pacificim?) then just switch it off for 0. No loss because that creature was useless to you anyways.
